00001 <?php

00012  * @author Mikel Madariaga <mikel@irontec.com>
00013  *
00014  * Clase encargada de recoger y guardar posts de wordpress
00015  */
00016 class Plugins_Wordpress_Cron extends Common_Cron
00017 {
00018     protected $_account;
00019     protected $_client;
00020 
00021     /***
00022      * Frecuencia con la que se revisa un post en busca de modificaciones,
00023      * número de comentarios etc
00024      */
00025     protected $_updateFrecuency;
00026 
00027     /**
00028      * @return unknown_type
00029      */
00030     function __construct()
00031     {
00032         parent::__construct();
00033         $this->_updateFrecuency = 60*30; //seconds
00034     }
00035 
00036     /**
00037      * Método encargado de establecer conexión con un portal wordpress
00038      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00039      * @param obj $auth
00040      */
00041     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00042      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#connect($idp)
00043      */
00044     public function connect($account)
00045     {
00046         $this->start = microtime();
00047 
00048         $this->_account = $account;
00049         $this->_idUP = $account->getId();
00050         $this->_credentials = json_decode($account->getAuth());
00051 
00052         $user = Auth::get_instance();
00053 
00054         $this->_ci->load->library('encrypt');
00055         $this->_credentials->password = $this->_ci->encrypt->decode($this->_credentials->password, sha1($user->getEmail()));
00056         $this->_credentials->username = $this->_ci->encrypt->decode($this->_credentials->username, sha1($user->getEmail()));
00057 
00058         /***
00059          * Refs::
00060          * http://life.mysiteonline.org/archives/161-Automatic-Post-Creation-with-Wordpress,-PHP,-and-XML-RPC.html
00061          * http://en.forums.wordpress.com/topic/upload-image-using-xmlrpcphp-script
00062          * http://codex.wordpress.org/XML-RPC_wp#wp.getComments
00063          */
00064         $this->_client = new IXR_Client(prep_url($this->_credentials->url).'/xmlrpc.php');
00065     }
00066 
00067     /**
00068      * Método encargado de recoger y guardar/actualizar los posts recientes del blog en cuestión
00069      * @return void
00070      */
00071     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00072      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#update()
00073      */
00074     public function update()
00075     {
00076         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00077 
00078         /***
00079          * Actualizar mensajes
00080          */
00081         if (!$this->_client->query(
00082             'mt.getRecentPostTitles',
00083             '', $this->_credentials->username,
00084             $this->_credentials->password, 10
00085         )) {
00086 
00087             return;
00088         }
00089 
00090         $resp = $this->_client->getResponse();
00091         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00092 
00093         foreach ($resp as $entry) {
00094 
00095             $message  = New Message_Data();
00096             $message->setRemoteId($entry["postid"]);
00097 
00098             $dbMessage = $messageMapper->find($message);
00099             if (count($dbMessage) > 0) {
00100 
00101                 $message = array_shift($dbMessage);
00102 
00103                 if (
00104                     $message->getData("fetched") !== false and
00105                     ( $message->getData("fetched") + $this->_updateFrecuency ) < time()
00106                 ) {
00107 
00108                     //Ignored item
00109                     continue;
00110                 }
00111             }
00112 
00113             if ($this->_client->query(
00114                 'metaWeblog.getPost',
00115                 $entry["postid"],
00116                 $this->_credentials->username,
00117                 $this->_credentials->password,
00118                 array("post_id" => $entry["postid"])
00119             )) {
00120 
00121                 $post = $this->_client->getResponse();
00122             }
00123 
00124             if ($this->_client->query(
00125                 'wp.getComments',
00126                 '',
00127                 $this->_credentials->username,
00128                 $this->_credentials->password,
00129                 array("post_id" => $entry["postid"])
00130             )) {
00131 
00132                 $post["comments"] = count($this->_client->getResponse());
00133             }
00134 
00135             Plugins_Wordpress_DB::save($post, $this->_idUP);
00136         }
00137 
00138         /***
00139          * Actualizar categorias
00140          */
00141         if (!$this->_client->query(
00142             'wp.getCategories', '',
00143             $this->_credentials->username, $this->_credentials->password
00144         )) {
00145 
00146             return;
00147         }
00148 
00149         $resp = $this->_client->getResponse();
00150         $categorias = array();
00151 
00152         foreach ($resp as $cat) {
00153 
00154             $id = $cat["categoryId"];
00155             $categorias[$id] = $cat;
00156         }
00157 
00158         $this->_account->setMetadata("categories", $categorias);
00159 
00160         if ($this->_account->isValid()) {
00161 
00162             $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00163             $this->_account->setLastUpdate(time());
00164 
00165             $data = array(
00166                 "metadata" =>  $this->_account->getMetadata(),
00167                 "lastUpdate" => $this->_account->getLastUpdate()
00168             );
00169 
00170             $accountMapper->updateFromArray($this->_account->getId(), $data);
00171         }
00172 
00173         if ($this->debugMode === true) {
00174             echo "\r\n Wordpress cron elapset time : ".$this->elapsedTime()."s\r\n";
00175         }
00176     }
00177 }
